#Text=Guadeloupe

#Text=Guadeloupe , known as Gwadloup in the local creole , and sometimes known as the Butterfly Island ( French : I'ile Papillon ) on account of the shape of two of its major islands , is a group of islands in the eastern Caribbean , and is a French overseas department .
#Text=It is located southeast of Puerto Rico .
#Text=Islands
#Text=Basse Terre : green and lush vegetation , mountainous with a sulphuric volcano .
#Text=Grande Terre : flat and dry with a lot of beaches , some of them very touristic .
#Text=Marie Galante : the biggest island out of mainland Guadeloupe .
#Text=Les Saintes : composed of Terre de Haut and Terre de Bas , one of the most beautiful bays .
#Text=La Désirade : dry and cliffy .
#Text=Petite Terre : uninhabited and untamed .
#Text=Cities
#Text=Grande Terre
#Text=Map of Guadeloupe
#Text=Pointe - à - Pitre : with its suburbs , it is the economic capital of Guadeloupe
#Text=Gosier : maybe one of the most interesting places of Guadeloupe to enjoy nightlife .
#Text=( You can enter most nightclubs with proper clothes , that is , no sneakers , no shorts )
#Text=St François if you go at the eastern point of Guadeloupe , you will reach La Pointe des Chateaux , a scenery made of sand and rocks which have vaguely the shape of a castle .

#Text=From there , you can look up at the islands La Désirade , Petite Terre , Marie Galante , Les Saintes , La Dominique but also have a perfect view of the islands Grande Terre and far away Basse Terre .
#Text=St Anne a very nice but also very touristy city and beach ( maybe the tourists primary area of Guadeloupe ) .
#Text=L'Americano , bd Georges Mandel , 0590883899 : bar / restaurant offers free salsa courses on Saturdays and live performances some days .
#Text=You will find all kind of bars .

#Text=You can try Club Med , 0590854950 fax : 0590854959 ( for instance , others resort may propose this formula too ) for a one day all inclusive ( breakfast , buffet , bars , drinks , beach volley , windsurf , boat , gym , dance courses ... ) for about € 46 , so it may be a good deal ( as it costs € 7 one hour of windsurf ) .
#Text=Morne à l'eau , renowned for its amazing cemetery composed of burial places made of black and white tiles .
#Text=Anse Bertrand , not far from there , you can visit La pointe de la Grande Vigie , northern point of mainland Guadeloupe .
#Text=You can also go to Porte d'Enfer , a beautiful still stripe of sea between a scenery of reefs .
#Text=From there , walk one hour along the cliff , and you will discover a Souffleur , kind of geyser due to the pressure of the sea .
#Text=Abymes nothing special to see , but the weekend , there are 3 local nightclubs : L'instant , Caraibes and Latin Club .
#Text=They are located at the same place .
#Text=Baie - Mahault : the industrial and commercial zone of Guadeloupe , nothing special to do or see .
#Text=Here stands the biggest shopping mall of the island .
#Text=Not too far from there , you can find a local bar / nightclub named Bik Kreyol , Beau Soleil , 0590258046 or 0590920648 ( Entrance € 5 , Drinks € 3 ) .
#Text=Local music ( ragga , zouk , rnb ) and local customers .
#Text=The building is typical , it 's a former warehouse .
#Text=Other destinations
#Text=Do n't miss the spectacular waterfalls in the jungle of Basse - Terre ( Carbet Falls ) .

#Text=Some are within 5 – 10 minutes walking distance from the nearest parking lot , some require at least 3 – 4 hours of hiking ( those are , of course less frequented by other tourists and you might find yourself alone at a spectacular waterfall in the middle of nowhere - an amazing experience ! ) .

#Text=The local rum distilleries offer tours ( check for opening times as they may very from season to season ) which are certainly worth the while since rum production is a very integral part of Guadeloupe 's economy .
#Text=And sampling the local rums is definitely worth the while .
#Text=Even though they might not be the best way to get around the island , a ride on the bus is still an experience you should not miss .
#Text=Cheap , full of locals , conducted by fearless drivers , you can enjoy the beautiful Caribbean panorama to the sound of Guadeloupean zouk music .
#Text=Some routes are not good for passengers with weak stomachs .

#Text=This guide lists attractions on each of the islands of Guadeloupe , a French overseas department in the Caribbean , focusing on places on the island of Grand Terre , including the economic capital Pointe - à - Pitre , the nightlife in Gosier , views from St François , the touristy city and beach of St Anne , cemetary of Morne à l'eau and other destinations around the islands .
